video.title: Space Racers
video.synopsis: Spaceships Eagle, Robyn, Hawk and their pals at the Stardust Space Academy rocket through the galaxy, teaching kids about the wonders of science.

episodes.synopsis: Inspired by TV hero Captain Cosmos, the cadets end up on an adventure that strands them on an unknown planet; the cadets train for a race across Mars.
episodes.title: Where Are We? / Mars Canyon Race

episodes.synopsis: Eagle and Starling compete in a traditional race to the moon and back during an eclipse; Robyn, Eagle and Hawk camp out on Titan over a long weekend.
episodes.title: Total Eclipse / Titanic Trip

episodes.synopsis: The cadets overhear Headmaster Crane discussing an upcoming project that requires lots of ice; the friends hunt for missing hero Swift Starlight.
episodes.title: (N)ice Work If You Can Get It / Ace Space Reporter!

episodes.synopsis: Eagle feels left out when Robyn and Hawk set out to explore without him; the Racers explore their options for the future at Career Day.
episodes.title: Three's a Crowd / Careering Off Course

episodes.synopsis: A deep-space probe returns to the solar system ahead of schedule and is headed for the sun; Eagle, Robyn and Hawk see a storm headed for Stardust Bay.
episodes.title: Fly Like an Eagle / Space Racer Storm Chaser

episodes.synopsis: The team finds a relic from an early Stardust program while cleaning up space garbage; the cadets find clues to an ancient civilization on Mars.
episodes.title: A Simple Re-Quest / Mars Map Mystery

episodes.synopsis: The Racers are called into Headmaster Crane's office after a class trip turns into disaster; a rowdy game causes damage on the lunar elevator.
episodes.title: Grounded / Satellite Starling

episodes.synopsis: Eagle and Robyn compete for the office of class president; Vulture demands a more magnificent statue of himself be placed on campus.
episodes.title: Election! / Vulture's Statue

episodes.synopsis: Headmaster Crane's students want to surprise him with a domed garden on Mars; a solar storm creates electrical problems at Stardust Bay.
episodes.title: Dome Grown / Communication Breakdown

episodes.synopsis: Vulture gives Hawk a secret assignment when the cadets study an asteroid; Eagle is too helpful with Hawk's assignment to build a moon elevator.
episodes.title: Asteroids, Platinum Edition / Hawk's Day

episodes.synopsis: A wrong move during an Orb-O game sends a space station plummeting toward Earth; the Racers stumble upon a scheme by Vulture in a dormant volcano.
episodes.title: The Sweet Spot / Vulture's Volcano

episodes.synopsis: Starling is alarmed when the moon seems smaller than it was the night before; the cadets investigate a loss of power on the moon.
episodes.title: Starling Discovers the Moon / Lunar Base Blackout

episodes.synopsis: Coot's baby robot escapes and takes on Robyn as its new "mother"; Robyn tries to show a boastful Eagle how to improve his Orb-O game.
episodes.title: Three Racers and a Robot / Above and Beyond

episodes.synopsis: The cadets are called on to help when a classmate named Crow disappears; Raven deceives Coot to find a way to beat Eagle in the Cloud Sprints Race.
episodes.title: Star Signs / The Hawk Factor

episodes.synopsis: Raven is swept into space while trying to take a sample from a passing comet; Starling boards Coot's rescue sub to save Sandpiper after a splashdown.
episodes.title: Trail Blazers / Starling, D.S.V.

episodes.synopsis: Starling trains to become a Space Racer -- with Vulture overseeing her progress; Vulture replaces Coach Pigeon with a robot spy.
episodes.title: Starling: Space Racer! / Robocoach XL-5

episodes.synopsis: The cadets and their teachers select items to pack in a time capsule; Headmaster Crane sends students on a scavenger hunt through the solar system.
episodes.title: A Tight Squeeze / Eyes on the Prize

episodes.synopsis: Robyn practices her choreography and Starling brushes up on her safety techniques for an upcoming talent show; the cadets get a lesson in sharing.
episodes.title: Dance Lessons / Mine, Mine, Mine!

episodes.synopsis: AVA shuts down when the cadets ask her a tough question about solar storms; Starling freezes up while playing hide-and-seek on Saturn's moons.
episodes.title: AVA Retires / Hiding on Hyperion

episodes.synopsis: Eagle's cold keeps him from participating in the test of a new solar engine; the Racers test Coot's new color-analyzing spectrometer.
episodes.title: Sick Day / Cranberry Crater

episodes.synopsis: The cadets make plans for vacations into unexplored realms of the solar system; Hawk takes charge of the workshop in Coot's absence.
episodes.title: Fearless Flyers / Hawk's on It

episodes.synopsis: Hawk receives a mysterious Valentine's invitation to meet an admirer on the far side of the moon; the cadets make vacation plans for winter break.
episodes.title: Hawk's Valentine / Robyn's Winter Break

episodes.synopsis: Coot helps cadets and teachers with projects, and Starling's doll goes missing; the cadets must place Coot's new satellite into orbit around Jupiter.
episodes.title: Good Old Coot / Dodo in Distress

episodes.synopsis: Headmaster Crane and Vulture must work together when a geomagnetic storm strands them in space; Hawk prepares for the "Captain Cosmos" convention.
episodes.title: Drifting / Follow the Water

episodes.synopsis: Crane bets Vulture that the sun can rise in the west; when Eagle alone sees a bright light in the sky, it disappears before the others can view it.
episodes.title: Here Comes the Sun / Watch this Space
